page.title: 14Where We Came From
page.content: {Alison I came from{Sunderland.}I was born in {Northallerton,}then I moved to{ {Sunderland}to a village called{Cleadon It was good there and I cried when we moved to{Southwell}but I like it here best.It is so pretty here and sunny{ in{summer.}When we had sun at Cleadon the sea{fret}came and{spoilt}it all. { {Chris I used to live in{Guiseley}in{West {Yorkshire.}I think it was a bit better than{Southwell}because it less {dangerous.}There were{fewer main roads but it wasn't famous for anything.It had two parts, {New Guiseley}and{Old {Guiseley. Old Guiseley}has been there for about{2000}years so it is about { {1000}years{older}than{Southwell.
